sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.LicenseFamilyDao</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>LicenseFamilyDao</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LicenseFamilyDao = Class.create();
LicenseFamilyDao.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /**
     * Retrieves the license family ids (license_family.sys_id) values associated with a subscription
     *
     * @param {guid} subscriptionId The subscription_entitlement.sys_id value to filter family ids by
     * @returns {array} An array of license_family.sys_id values
     */
    getLicenseFamilyIdsBySubscriptionId: function(subscriptionId) {
        const gr = new GlideRecord('subscription_has_family');
        gr.addQuery('subscription.sys_id', subscriptionId);
        gr.query();

        let ids = [];
        while (gr.next())
            ids.push(String(gr.subscription_family.sys_id));
        return ids;
    },

    type: 'LicenseFamilyDao'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-02-16 22:33:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6d5e5175ffc12110468365d7d3b8fe86</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LicenseFamilyDao</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6d5e5175ffc12110468365d7d3b8fe86</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-08-18 16:53:26</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
